entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Freezing rain inland late in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm except 40 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Windy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022
